verbs.description: ham on biscuits [ARG0: i] [V: enjoy] [ARG1: entertaining friends at luncheons] they always compliment me on these special little ham sandwiches made on cheesy homemade biscuits usually i use smithfield ham but if salty ham is not your preference any thin - sliced ham works well —betsy hedeman timonium maryland
